info.title: Exchange Rates API
info.description: Exchange Rates API for retrieving daily, weekly, biweekly, and monthly currency exchange rates from official sources (central banks, tax authorities). Visit our website to find up-to-date information on the supported data sources and detailed API features.

get.summary: Returns the bank holidays for the specified bank and year. (Auth policies: RequireBankSubscription)
Returns the bank holidays for the specified bank and date range. (Auth policies: RequireBankSubscription)

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date of the range.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date of the range. The maximum interval is 3 years (1095 days).

400.description: Invalid bankId or date range specified.

get.summary: Returns the next upcoming bank holiday for the specified bank. (Auth policies: RequireBankSubscription)

204.description: The bank holidays are not available for the given bank.

get.summary: Returns the bank details for all available banks. (Auth)
Returns the bank details for the specified bank. (Auth)
Returns the data availability information. (Auth policies: RequireBankSubscription)

204.description: The data availability information is not available.

get.summary: Returns the data availability information for the specified period. (Auth policies: RequireBankSubscription)

204.description: The data availability information is not available.

get.summary: Returns the latest available exchange rates. (Auth policies: RequireBankSubscription)

parameters.name: currencies
parameters.description: The currencies to return. If no currencies are provided, all available currencies will be included in the results.

parameters.name: priceType
parameters.description: The requested price type. Defaults to mid.

parameters.name: includeObsoleteCurrencies
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether obsolete currencies should be included in the results. Defaults to false.

get.summary: Returns the exchange rates for the given month. (Auth policies: RequireBankSubscription)

parameters.name: currencies
parameters.description: The currencies to return. If no currencies are provided, all available currencies will be included in the results.

parameters.name: priceType
parameters.description: The requested price type. Defaults to mid.

parameters.name: includeObsoleteCurrencies
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether obsolete currencies should be included in the results. Defaults to false.

get.summary: Returns the exchange rates for the current month (in UTC time). (Auth policies: RequireBankSubscription)

parameters.name: currencies
parameters.description: The currencies to return. If no currencies are provided, all available currencies will be included in the results.

parameters.name: priceType
parameters.description: The requested price type. Defaults to mid.

parameters.name: includeObsoleteCurrencies
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether obsolete currencies should be included in the results. Defaults to false.

get.summary: Convert an amount from one currency to another. (Auth)

example.title: One or more validation errors occurred.

errors.bankId: Daily rates are not supported for the specified bank.

get.summary: Returns the currency details for all available currencies. (Auth)

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The optional country code to filter the currencies by the specific country.

parameters.name: isObsolete
parameters.description: The optional flag to filter currencies based on whether they are obsolete (true) or still in circulation (false).

get.summary: Returns the currency details for the specified currency code. (Auth)
Returns the data availability information. (Auth policies: RequireBankSubscription)

204.description: The data availability information is not available.

get.summary: Returns the data availability information for the specified period. (Auth policies: RequireBankSubscription)

204.description: The data availability information is not available.

availableCurrencies.description: The list of available currency codes.

availablePriceTypes.description: The list of available price types.

date.description: The date on which the holiday is observed.

name.description: The English name of the holiday.

localName.description: The local name of the holiday.

dailyUpdateTime.description: The time at which the daily exchange rates are published by the bank.

countryCode.description: The country (or countries) for which the bank provides exchange rates.

supportedFrequencies.description: The exchange rate frequencies available for the bank.

supportedPriceTypes.description: The price types available for the bank.

unitMultiplier.description: Exponent in base 10 specified so that multiplying the rate by 10^UnitMultiplier gives a value expressed in the unit of measure.

rate.description: The list of exchange rates used for the conversion.

name.description: The English name of the currency.

isObsolete.description: Indicates if the currency is no longer in use.

withdrawalDate.description: The date when the currency was withdrawn from circulation.

countryCodes.description: The countries in which the currency is used.

ExchangeRateQuoteType.description:
Quote type:
* `Direct` - The foreign currency is the base currency. The cost of one unit of foreign currency is given in units of local currency.
* `Indirect` - The local currency is the base currency. The cost of one unit of local currency is given in units of foreign currency.

additionalProperties.description: A dictionary of rates for a single date, keyed by the 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code.

rates.description: The exchange rates. The **first level key is the rate date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)**. The value is a dictionary where the key is the **3-letter ISO 4217 quote currency code**.

Format.description:
Response format:
* `Json` - JSON
* `Xml` - XML
* `Xlsx` - Excel (xlsx)
* `Csv` - CSV
* `SapFlatFile` - SAP Flat File

peggedSince.description: The date from which the fixed rate applies.

PriceType.description:
Price type:
* `Mid` - Midpoint price
* `Bid` - Buying (bid) price
* `Ask` - Selling (ask) price

unitMultiplier.description: Exponent in base 10 specified so that multiplying the rate by 10^UnitMultiplier gives a value expressed in the unit of measure.

windowsTimeZoneId.description: The time zone identifier on Windows platforms.

Retry-After.description: Time in seconds until the next request is allowed

schema.description: Time in seconds until the next request is allowed

example.title: One or more validation errors occurred.

errors.bankId: Daily rates are not supported for the specified bank.

sampleFileText.summary: The text representation of a sample SAP Flat File
The text representation of a sample CSV file
sampleFileText.value:
BankId,From Currency,To Currency,Effective Date,Exchange Rate,Unit
NOCB,CHF,NOK,2020-09-24,1030.66,100
NOCB,CNY,NOK,2020-09-24,139.6,100
NOCB,EUR,NOK,2020-09-24,11.1023,1
NOCB,USD,NOK,2020-09-24,9.534,1

sampleFileText.summary: The text representation of a sample XML file
sampleFileText.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExchangeRates xmlns="http://schemas.fluentax.com/ExchangeRates/1.0/ExchangeRates">
   <BankId>NOCB</BankId>
   <BaseCurrency>NOK</BaseCurrency>
   <QuoteType>Direct</QuoteType>
   <Rates effectiveDate="2020-09-24">
      <Rate currency="CHF" value="1030.66" unitMultiplier="2" />
      <Rate currency="CNY" value="139.6" unitMultiplier="2" />
      <Rate currency="EUR" value="11.1023" />
      <Rate currency="USD" value="9.534" />
   </Rates>
</ExchangeRates>

XRateLimitLimit.description: The rate limit period that is applicable for the current request (eg. 1m, 12h, 1d)

schema.description: The rate limit period that is applicable for the current request (eg. 1m, 12h, 1d)

XRateLimitRemaining.description: The number of requests left for the current rate-limit window

schema.description: The number of requests left for the current rate-limit window

XRateLimitReset.description: UTC date time (ISO 8601) when the rate limit resets

schema.description: UTC date time (ISO 8601) when the rate limit resets

oauth2.description: OAuth 2.0 authentication. Use the Authorization Code with PKCE flow for interactive logins and the Client Credentials flow for non-interactive (M2M) logins.

apiKeyQuery.description: API key supplied as a query parameter
apiKeyQuery.name: apiKey
